about_the_game:
Test your brain and your reflexes. Try to combine bubbles before they reach the top and match the target before time runs out. Earn powerups along the way to help you survive longer.

With every level the bubbles appear and move faster. Chose from Beginner, Easy, Medium and Difficult Settings. Each one makes it harder by increasing spawn rate, bubble speed and reducing perks – so you’ll always be challenged.
detailed_description:
Test your brain and your reflexes. Try to combine bubbles before they reach the top and match the target before time runs out. Earn powerups along the way to help you survive longer.

With every level the bubbles appear and move faster. Chose from Beginner, Easy, Medium and Difficult Settings. Each one makes it harder by increasing spawn rate, bubble speed and reducing perks – so you’ll always be challenged.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested with Ubuntu 20.04, earlier versions may work
  • Processor: I5 2400 with dedicated GPU, i7 4600 if using integrated graphics
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 2.1 Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Specs for 1920x1080, may be able to run at lower resolutions with lesser equipment
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Tested with Ubuntu 20.04, earlier versions may work
  • Processor: Intel I7 3770 or higher w/ dedicated GPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 2.1 Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Specs for 1920x1080, may be able to run at lower resolutions with lesser equipment

name: ImpossiBubble

  • Processor: I5 2400 with dedicated GPU, i7 4600 if using integrated graphics
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 2.1 Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Specs for 1920x1080, may be able to run at lower resolutions with lesser equipment

short_description: Test your brain and your reflexes. Try to combine bubbles before they reach the top and match the target before time runs out. Earn powerups along the way to help you survive longer.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese, Czech, Greek, Hungarian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Filipino, Hebrew
